title: Premium Product Catalog Page
description: A visually stunning and premium product catalog page with indigo and peach themes, rich gradients, and unique animations.

generation_hints.image_optimization: Use next/image with priority loading for above-fold products
generation_hints.animations: Add hover scale and gradient transitions on product cards using framer-motion
generation_hints.morphing_blobs: Implement animated blob shapes in background using CSS or SVG
generation_hints.parallax: Add subtle parallax scrolling effects on hero sections
generation_hints.skeleton_loading: Show elegant skeleton loaders with gradient shimmer while loading
